meanings.definition: A person who pays wages or salaries.
meanings.sent1: The paymaster handed out the employees' salaries.
meanings.sent2: The company's paymaster ensures everyone gets paid on time.
meanings.sent3: The paymaster accidentally gave everyone double paychecks!
meanings.sent4: She was the paymaster of happiness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The diligent paymaster meticulously calculated each worker's earnings.

meanings.definition: An officer in the military responsible for paying troops.
meanings.sent1: The paymaster in the army distributed the soldiers' wages.
meanings.sent2: The military paymaster ensures the troops receive their pay accurately.
meanings.sent3: The paymaster in the army tried to pay the soldiers in chocolate coins as a joke.
meanings.sent4: He was the paymaster of discipline, rewarding the soldiers for their hard work.
meanings.sent5: The strict paymaster made sure every soldier received their dues promptly.

meanings.definition: A person or organization responsible for making payments.
meanings.sent1: The paymaster at the charity organization handled all the donations.
meanings.sent2: The company's paymaster processed all the financial transactions.
meanings.sent3: The paymaster for the event accidentally paid the caterer twice.
meanings.sent4: She was the paymaster of generosity, always ready to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The efficient paymaster ensured all bills were settled on time.
